Tutorials
=========

<!--- Referenzierung an anderen Positionen mÃ¶glich, wird nicht angezeigt --->
(tutorials)=

### Installation
```
git clone ...
cd verify_uuid/src
pip3 install -r requirements.txt
```


### Starting
- Open help menu with all available functions:
```
python3 main.py -h
```
- Further usage options with detailed instructions on specific questions can be found in the {ref}`How-To Guides<howto>`.
